## Summary
- What changed?
- Why now?

## Checklist
- [ ] Branch follows naming convention
- [ ] Scope is focused and minimal
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] CI passes (lint/typecheck/test)
- [ ] Risks and rollback considered

## Review (RALPH)
- [ ] R: Feedback collected
- [ ] A: Fixes applied
- [ ] L: Rationale logged for unresolved suggestions
- [ ] P: Updates pushed
- [ ] H: Re-review requested

## Consensus
- [ ] Required reviewers approved
- [ ] Final concerns resolved

## Notes for Owner Notification
(Short message to send after merge)
